commit message: Solved issue #1 by managing the hardware back button. The legacy back soft-button can be enabled/disabled with a setting.

Added an about screen.
Remove code to try to restore the current page of buttons displayed when coming back to the activity. Wasn't working well and not really necessary.
Added photo waypoint tracking with built-in camera app
Added a graphic theme settings for the main window. For the moment works with default system themes.

Added an about screen
Added photo taking ability
Added theme system + custom high-contrast theme
Better management of hardware back-button
appVersion must be a String a not a reference...
